column3: Latest;Phnom Penh:------  A drunk old man went to for a two hour ------massage------
column5: yelling and accusing a woman of stealing $ 100. This occurred on November 24
column9: behind Sovanna Shopping Mall on Street 199 In Sangkat Tumnub Tek
column11: Phnom Penh.------The old man had earlier gone to the SPINE CENTER for a 3 hour and went back home without any problems. At 11pm the same day the old man returned after drinking.------He arranged a room on the fourth floor and two hours later burst out naked shouting that a woman who was treating him stole $ 100. He then managed to get himself clothed and began making a fuss on the street.------After the incident
column12: cops were on patrol in the area heard the commotion and are investigating.------http://www.arey-news.com/archives/274154
